Class TrackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.helsinki.cs.jakaarel.levyhylly.controllers.TrackController

  • @Controller
public class TrackController
extends Object
    A REST controller for manipulating Tracks.
    Author:
    jakaarl

    • Method Detail

      • loadTracks

        @RequestMapping(value="/albums/{albumId}/tracks",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public List<Track> loadTracks(@PathVariable
                                                 Long albumId)
        Fetches track listing for given album.
        Parameters:
        albumId - album identifier.
        Returns:
        album tracks, rendered as JSON.

      • addTrack

        @RequestMapping(value="/albums/{albumId}/tracks",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Track addTrack(@PathVariable
                                         Long albumId,
                                         @RequestBody
                                         TrackController.AddedTrack track)
        Adds a new track to an album. If the added track has a track number, it will replace that track, otherwise it is added after the existing tracks.
        Parameters:
        albumId - album identifier.
        track - track to add.
        Returns:
        newly created track, rendered as JSON.

      • removeTrack

        @RequestMapping(value="/albums/{albumId}/tracks/{number}",
                method=DELETE)
@ResponseBody
public Track removeTrack(@PathVariable
                                            Long albumId,
                                            @PathVariable
                                            Short number)
        Removes track.
        Parameters:
        albumId - album identifier.
        number - track number.
        Returns:
        the removed track.
